messages.content:
tolong buatkan website dengan ;       üéØ Website yang Cocok untuk Coffee Shop
1Ô∏è‚É£ Company Profile + Menu Online (Basic)

Cocok kalau:

Mereka belum terlalu besar

Fokus branding dulu

Isi website:

Home (foto tempat + suasana)

Tentang kami

Menu lengkap + harga

Lokasi (Google Maps)

Kontak & WhatsApp

üëâ Ini versi paling aman & realistis.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Website + Sistem Reservasi Meja

Kalau mereka:

Sering penuh

Ada live music / event

Bisa tambah:

Booking meja online

Pilih tanggal & jam

Konfirmasi via WhatsApp otomatis

3Ô∏è‚É£ Website + Pemesanan Online (Lebih Powerful)

Kalau mau serius:

Fitur:

Order kopi dari website

Pilih pickup / delivery

Pembayaran transfer / e-wallet

Kode promo

Loyalty point

Saya akan membantu Anda membuat website untuk Coffee Shop. Saya akan membuat template lengkap yang cocok untuk berbagai kebutuhan bisnis kopi.Saya akan buatkan template website Coffee Shop yang lengkap! Saya akan memberikan 3 versi sesuai kebutuhan Anda. Berikut adalah struktur project dan file-file yang diperlukan: ## üìÅ Struktur Project ``` coffee-shop-website/ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ index.html (Home) ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ about.html (Tentang Kami) ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ menu.html (Menu Online) ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ reservation.html (Reservasi Meja) ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ order.html (Pemesanan Online) ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ contact.html (Kontak) ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ css/ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ style.css (Styling utama) ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ responsive.css (Mobile-friendly) ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ js/ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ main.js ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ reservation.js ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ order.js ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ images/ ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ (folder untuk foto) ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ README.md ``` --- ## üéØ VERSI 1: Website Dasar (Company Profile + Menu) ### 1. Home Page ```html name=index.html Kopilicious Coffee Shop - Kopi Terbaik di Kota

‚òï Kopilicious

  • Home
  • Tentang Kami
  • Menu
  • Kontak

Suasana Nyaman

Tempat santai dengan WiFi gratis

Barista Profesional

Tim berpengalaman siap melayani

Harga Terjangkau

Kualitas premium dengan harga bersahabat

Kopilicious Coffee

Jam Operasional

Senin - Jumat: 06:00 - 21:00

Sabtu - Minggu: 07:00 - 22:00

üì± WhatsApp: +62 812-3456-7890

üìß Email: info@kopilicious.com

© 2026 Kopilicious Coffee. All rights reserved.

``` ### 2. Menu Page ```html name=menu.html Menu - Kopilicious Coffee Shop

‚òï Kopilicious

  • Home
  • Tentang Kami
  • Menu

Daftar Menu

Pilih minuman favorit Anda

Kopilicious Coffee

Jam Operasional

Senin - Jumat: 06:00 - 21:00

Sabtu - Minggu: 07:00 - 22:00

Hubungi Kami

üì± WhatsApp: +62 812-3456-7890

üìß Email: info@kopilicious.com

© 2026 Kopilicious Coffee. All rights reserved.

``` ### 3. About Page ```html name=about.html Tentang Kami - Kopilicious Coffee Shop

‚òï Kopilicious

  • Home
  • Tentang Kami
  • Menu
  • Kontak

Tentang Kopilicious

Kisah Kami

Kopilicious Coffee dimulai pada tahun 2020 dengan mimpi sederhana: menciptakan ruang di mana orang-orang dapat bersantai, berbisnis, dan bersosialisasi sambil menikmati kopi berkualitas tinggi.

Visi Kami

Menjadi coffee shop favorit yang menyediakan kopi terbaik dengan suasana hangat dan pelayanan prima.

Misi Kami

  • Menyajikan kopi berkualitas dari biji pilihan terbaik
  • Memberikan pengalaman suasana yang nyaman dan memorable
  • Membangun komunitas pecinta kopi yang solid
  • Memberikan pelayanan yang ramah dan profesional

Tim Kami

Kami memiliki tim barista berpengalaman yang siap memberikan pelayanan terbaik

Kopilicious Coffee

Tempat terbaik untuk menemani hari Anda

Jam Operasional

Senin - Jumat: 06:00 - 21:00

Sabtu - Minggu: 07:00 - 22:00

Hubungi Kami

üì± WhatsApp: +62 812-3456-7890

üìß Email: info@kopilicious.com

© 2026 Kopilicious Coffee. All rights reserved.

``` ### 4. Contact Page ```html name=contact.html Kontak Kami - Kopilicious Coffee Shop

‚òï Kopilicious

  • Home

  • Kontak

© 2026 Kopilicious Coffee. All rights reserved.

``` --- ## üé® CSS Styling ### Main CSS ```css name=css/style.css * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; color: #333; background-color: #f9f7f4; } .container { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 20px; } /* ========== NAVBAR ========== */ .navbar { background-color: #6f4e37; color: white; padding: 1rem 0; position: sticky; top: 0; z-index: 100; box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); } .navbar .container { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; } .nav-brand h1 { font-size: 1.8rem; font-weight: bold; } .nav-menu { display: flex; list-style: none; gap: 2rem; } .nav-menu a { color: white; text-decoration: none; transition: color 0.3s ease; font-weight: 500; } .nav-menu a:hover, .nav-menu a.active { color: #f4a460; border-bottom: 2px solid #f4a460; padding-bottom: 5px; } .hamburger { display: none; flex-direction: column; cursor: pointer; } .hamburger span { width: 25px; height: 3px; background-color: white; margin: 5px 0; transition: 0.3s; } /* ========== BUTTONS ========== */ .btn { display: inline-block; padding: 12px 30px; text-decoration: none; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; transition: all 0.3s ease; text-align: center; } .btn-primary { background-color: #d2691e; color: white; } .btn-primary:hover { background-color: #8b4513; transform: translateY(-3px); box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.2); } .btn-secondary { background-color: #f4a460; color: white; } .btn-secondary:hover { background-color: #d2691e; } /* ========== HERO SECTION ========== */ .hero { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; padding: 60px 20px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6f4e37 0%, #8b6f47 100%); color: white; min-height: 500px; } .hero-content { flex: 1; max-width: 500px; } .hero-content h2 { font-size: 3rem; margin-bottom: 20px; animation: slideInLeft 0.8s ease; } .hero-content p { font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 30px; color: #f4a460; } .hero-image { flex: 1; text-align: center; } .hero-image img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); } /* ========== FEATURED SECTION ========== */ .featured { padding: 60px 20px; background-color: white; } .featured h2 { text-align: center; font-size: 2.5rem; margin-bottom: 50px; color: #6f4e37; } .featured-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr)); gap: 30px; } .card { background-color: #f9f7f4; border-radius: 10px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease; } .card:hover { transform: translateY(-10px); box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); } .card img { width: 100%; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; } .card h3 { padding: 20px 20px 10px; color: #6f4e37; font-size: 1.5rem; } .card p { padding: 0 20px 20px; color: #666; } /* ========== WHY US SECTION ========== */ .why-us { padding: 60px 20px; background-color: #6f4e37; color: white; } .why-us h2 { text-align: center; font-size: 2.5rem; margin-bottom: 50px; } .features { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr)); gap: 30px; } .feature-item { text-align: center; } .feature-item i { font-size: 3rem; color: #f4a460; margin-bottom: 15px; } .feature-item h3 { margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 1.3rem; } .feature-item p { color: #f0f0f0; } /* ========== MENU SECTION ========== */ .menu-section { padding: 60px 20px; background-color: white; } .menu-section h2 { text-align: center; font-size: 2.5rem; color: #6f4e37; margin-bottom: 10px; } .subtitle { text-align: center; color: #999; margin-bottom: 40px; font-size: 1.1rem; } .menu-filter { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; margin-bottom: 40px; flex-wrap: wrap; } .filter-btn { padding: 10px 20px; border: 2px solid #6f4e37; background-color: white; color: #6f4e37; border-radius: 25px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .filter-btn:hover, .filter-btn.active { background-color: #6f4e37; color: white; } .menu-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr)); gap: 30px; } .menu-item { display: flex; background-color: #f9f7f4; border-radius: 10px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); transition: transform 0.3s ease; } .menu-item:hover { transform: translateY(-5px); box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); } .menu-image { width: 120px; min-width: 120px; height: 120px; overflow: hidden; } .menu-image img { width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; } .menu-details { flex: 1; padding: 20px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: space-between; } .menu-details h3 { color: #6f4e37; margin-bottom: 8px; font-size: 1.2rem; } .menu-details p { color: #666; font-size: 0.9rem; margin-bottom: 15px; flex-grow: 1; } .menu-price { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; } .price { font-weight: bold; color: #d2691e; font-size: 1.2rem; } .menu-price small { color: #999; font-size: 0.85rem; } /* ========== CONTACT SECTION ========== */ .contact-section { padding: 60px 20px; background-color: white; } .contact-section h2 { text-align: center; font-size: 2.5rem; color: #6f4e37; margin-bottom: 50px; } .contact-content { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 40px; margin-bottom: 60px; } .contact-info h3, .contact-form-wrapper h3 { color: #6f4e37; margin-bottom: 30px; font-size: 1.5rem; } .info-item { display: flex; gap: 20px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .info-item i { font-size: 1.5rem; color: #d2691e; min-width: 30px; } .info-item h4 { color: #6f4e37; margin-bottom: 5px; } .info-item p { color: #666; } .info-item a { color: #d2691e; text-decoration: none; } .info-item a:hover { text-decoration: underline; } .social-links { display: flex; gap: 15px; margin-top: 30px; } .social-links a { width: 50px; height: 50px; border-radius: 50%; background-color: #6f4e37; color: white; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 1.5rem; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .social-links a:hover { background-color: #d2691e; transform: translateY(-5px); } /* ========== CONTACT FORM ========== */ .contact-form { display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .form-group { margin-bottom: 20px; } .form-group label { display: block; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #6f4e37; font-weight: 500; } .form-group input, .form-group textarea { width: 100%; padding: 12px; border: 2px solid #e0e0e0; border-radius: 5px; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1rem; transition: border-color 0.3s ease; } .form-group input:focus, .form-group textarea:focus { outline: none; border-color: #d2691e; box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(210, 105, 30, 0.3); } .contact-form button { align-self: flex-start; } /* ========== MAP SECTION ========== */ .map-container { margin-top: 60px; } .map-container h3 { color: #6f4e37; margin-bottom: 20px; font-size: 1.5rem; } .map-container iframe { border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); } /* ========== CTA SECTION ========== */ .cta { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6f4e37 0%, #8b6f47 100%); color: white; padding: 60px 20px; text-align: center; } .cta h2 { font-size: 2.5rem; margin-bottom: 20px; } .cta p { font-size: 1.2rem; margin-bottom: 30px; color: #f4a460; } /* ========== ABOUT SECTION ========== */ .about-section { padding: 60px 20px; background-color: white; } .about-section h2 { text-align: center; font-size: 2.5rem; color: #6f4e37; margin-bottom: 50px; } .about-content { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 40px; margin-bottom: 60px; align-items: center; } .about-text h3 { color: #6f4e37; margin: 30px 0 15px; font-size: 1.5rem; } .about-text h3:first-child { margin-top: 0; } .about-text p { color: #666; margin-bottom: 15px; text-align: justify; } .about-text ul { list-style-position: inside; color: #666; } .about-text li { margin-bottom: 10px; } .about-image img { width: 100%; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.2); } .team-section { text-align: center; padding: 40px 0; border-top: 2px solid #f0f0f0; } .team-section h3 { color: #6f4e37; font-size: 1.8rem; margin-bottom: 15px; } .team-section p { color: #999; margin-bottom: 30px; } /* ========== FOOTER ========== */ .footer { background-color: #6f4e37; color: white; padding: 50px 20px 20px; } .footer-content { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr)); gap: 30px; margin-bottom: 30px; } .footer-section h3 { color: #f4a460; margin-bottom: 15px; } .footer-section p { color: #f0f0f0; margin-bottom: 8px; } .footer-section a { color: #f4a460; text-decoration: none; transition: color 0.3s ease; } .footer-section a:hover { color: white; } .footer-bottom { text-align: center; padding-top: 20px; border-top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1); color: #ccc; } /* ========== ANIMATIONS ========== */ @keyframes slideInLeft { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-50px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } } @keyframes slideInRight { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(50px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } } ``` ### Responsive CSS ```css name=css/responsive.css /* ========== TABLET (768px) ========== */ @media (max-width: 768px) { .nav-menu { gap: 1rem; } .nav-menu a { font-size: 0.95rem; } .hero { flex-direction: column; padding: 40px 20px; min-height: auto; } .hero-content h2 { font-size: 2rem; } .hero-content p { font-size: 1.1rem; } .hero-image { margin-top: 30px; } .featured-grid, .menu-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr)); gap: 20px; } .features { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); } .contact-content { grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 30px; } .about-content { grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 30px; } .footer-content { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); } .menu-item { flex-direction: column; } .menu-image { width: 100%; height: 200px; } } /* ========== MOBILE (480px) ========== */ @media (max-width: 480px) { .hamburger { display: flex; } .nav-menu { position: absolute; top: 60px; left: 0; flex-direction: column; background-color: #6f4e37; width: 100%; padding: 20px; gap: 0; display: none; } .nav-menu.active { display: flex; } .nav-menu a { padding: 10px 0; } .nav-brand h1 { font-size: 1.3rem; } .hero-content h2 { font-size: 1.5rem; } .hero-content p { font-size: 1rem; } .featured h2, .menu-section h2, .contact-section h2, .about-section h2, .why-us h2, .cta h2 { font-size: 1.8rem; } .featured-grid, .menu-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; } .features { grid-template-columns: 1fr; } .menu-filter { gap: 10px; } .filter-btn { padding: 8px 15px; font-size: 0.9rem; } .contact-form button { width: 100%; } .footer-content { grid-template-columns: 1fr; } .cta p { font-size: 1rem; } .social-links { justify-content: center; } } ``` --- ## üìÑ JavaScript ### Main JavaScript ```javascript name=js/main.js // Mobile Menu Toggle const hamburger = document.querySelector('.hamburger'); const navMenu = document.querySelector('.nav-menu'); if (hamburger) { hamburger.addEventListener('click', () => { navMenu.classList.toggle('active'); hamburger.classList.toggle('active'); }); // Close menu when a link is clicked document.querySelectorAll('.nav-menu a').forEach(link => { link.addEventListener('click', () => { navMenu.classList.remove('active'); hamburger.classList.remove('active'); }); }); } // Menu Filter Functionality const filterBtns = document.querySelectorAll('.filter-btn'); const menuItems = document.querySelectorAll('.menu-item'); if (filterBtns.length > 0) { filterBtns.forEach(btn => { btn.addEventListener('click', () => { // Remove active class from all buttons filterBtns.forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active')); // Add active class to clicked button btn.classList.add('active'); const filterValue = btn.getAttribute('data-filter'); menuItems.forEach(item => { const itemCategory = item.getAttribute('data-category'); if (filterValue === 'all' || itemCategory === filterValue) { item.style.display = 'flex'; item.classList.add('fade-in'); } else { item.style.display = 'none'; } }); }); }); } // Smooth Scrolling document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => { anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) { e.preventDefault(); const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href')); if (target) { target.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' }); } }); }); // Add fade-in animation const style = document.createElement('style'); style.textContent = ` .fade-in { animation: fadeIn 0.5s ease; } @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } `; document.head.appendChild(style); console.log('‚úÖ Website Kopilicious Coffee Shop loaded successfully!'); ``` --- ## üîÑ VERSI 2: Website + Sistem Reservasi Meja ### Reservation Page ```html name=reservation.html Reservasi Meja - Kopilicious Coffee Shop

‚òï Kopilicious

  • Home
  • Tentang Kami
  • Menu
  • Reservasi
  • Kontak

Reservasi Meja

Booking meja favorit Anda untuk event atau kumpul-kumpul

Form Reservasi

Informasi Penting

üìÖ Kebijakan Reservasi

  • Reservasi dapat dilakukan 14 hari sebelumnya
  • Konfirmasi akan dikirim via WhatsApp
  • Mohon tiba 15 menit lebih awal
  • Jika tidak bisa datang, hubungi kami sebelum jam reservasi

üí∫ Tipe Tempat Duduk

  • Indoor: AC, WiFi gratis, nyaman untuk kerja
  • Outdoor: Suasana open air, view bagus untuk foto
  • VIP: Area privat, cocok untuk acara khusus

üéµ Event & Live Music

Setiap Jumat & Sabtu malam kami menghadirkan live music. Hubungi kami untuk info lebih lanjut!

üì± Hubungi Kami

WhatsApp: +62 812-3456-7890

Telepon: +62 812-3456-7890

Kopilicious Coffee

Tempat terbaik untuk menemani hari Anda

Jam Operasional

Senin - Jumat: 06:00 - 21:00

Sabtu - Minggu: 07:00 - 22:00

Hubungi Kami

üì± WhatsApp: +62 812-3456

references.text:
failed to execute githubwrite tool. The agent responded with: It seems that creating a new repository is not currently supported. However, I can guide you through the process of creating a repository on GitHub using their web interface.

1. **Log in to GitHub**.
2. **Click the '+' icon** in the upper right corner of the page, then select **'New repository'**.
3. **Fill out the repository information**: 
   - **Repository name**: `coffee-shop-website`
   - Optionally, provide a description.
   - Select the repository visibility (public or private).
4. Click **'Create repository'**.

If you need assistance with anything else or if there's a different action you want me to take regarding this repository, please let me know!

Tentang Kopilicious

Kisah Kami

Kopilicious Coffee dimulai pada tahun 2020 dengan mimpi sederhana: menciptakan ruang di mana orang-orang dapat bersantai, berbisnis, dan bersosialisasi sambil menikmati kopi berkualitas tinggi.

Visi Kami

Menjadi coffee shop favorit yang menyediakan kopi terbaik dengan suasana hangat dan pelayanan prima.

Misi Kami

  • Menyajikan kopi berkualitas dari biji pilihan terbaik
  • Memberikan pengalaman suasana yang nyaman dan memorable
  • Membangun komunitas pecinta kopi yang solid
  • Memberikan pelayanan yang ramah dan profesional

Tim Kami

Kami memiliki tim barista berpengalaman yang siap memberikan pelayanan terbaik

Reservasi Meja

Booking meja favorit Anda untuk event atau kumpul-kumpul

Form Reservasi

Informasi Penting

üìÖ Kebijakan Reservasi

  • Reservasi dapat dilakukan 14 hari sebelumnya
  • Konfirmasi akan dikirim via WhatsApp
  • Mohon tiba 15 menit lebih awal
  • Jika tidak bisa datang, hubungi kami sebelum jam reservasi

üí∫ Tipe Tempat Duduk

  • Indoor: AC, WiFi gratis, nyaman untuk kerja
  • Outdoor: Suasana open air, view bagus untuk foto
  • VIP: Area privat, cocok untuk acara khusus

üéµ Event & Live Music

Setiap Jumat & Sabtu malam kami menghadirkan live music. Hubungi kami untuk info lebih lanjut!
